title: Grok Video Prompter Extension
summary: Chrome extension for advanced prompt management, bulk video generation automation, and persistent video history tracking on Grok.com. Features include JSON/RAW prompt editors, template system, upload automation, Quick Edit/Quick Video modes, Gallery Automation (Spicy Mode, Quick Raw/JSON, Upscale Mode), unified video storage (IndexedDB), per-account history, and playlist management. v1.21.47: ImagineGod integration - Job Queue System, Generation Rail Status UI, centralized selectors, and React compatibility fixes.

artifacts.description: Centralized state management and data persistence
Centralized DOM selector constants
Background persistent job queue for upscale/unlike tasks
Generation Status Rail UI overlay
IndexedDB operations for unified video history and gallery data
API interception, account detection, and unified storage ingestion
Main UI orchestrator, Quick Launch toggles, Gallery Automation, and history tab rendering
Entry point, Quick Launch manager, Quick Video click detection
JSON editor tab dynamic form generation
RAW prompt tab, saved slots with custom naming, inline editing
Upload queue UI component
History/playlist tab and video player
Auto-retry for moderated generations with triple guard protection
Upload mode automation logic
Chrome storage operations for settings
API-based progress tracking
React UI interaction automation (reactClick, sendToGenerator, field filling)
Extension manifest (MV3)
Quick Video from Edit automation feature documentation
Gallery Automation features (Spicy Mode, Quick Raw/JSON, Upscale Mode)
Toast Notification System API, implementation patterns, and mandatory checklist
Detailed documentation of Unified Storage System and current limitations
Upload Mode canonical flow, payload structure, URL formats, and moderation distinction
Deep-dive diagrams for IndexedDB unified storage, History Tab data flow, and Quick Raw/JSON automation
Documentation for the Unified Logging System (GVPLogger), debugging toggle, and migration guide
